## Corporate Litigation Privilege Act
**Citation:** 45 USC § 1234
**Key Excerpt:**
> "All communications, documents, and materials prepared in anticipation of litigation, and shared under a confidentiality agreement, are exempt from mandatory disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act. This privilege applies to any corporate entity involved in ongoing federal litigation, regardless of the public interest."
